com.mesosphere.sdk.curator

Class CuratorSchemaVersionStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.curator.CuratorSchemaVersionStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SchemaVersionStore

    public class CuratorSchemaVersionStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements SchemaVersionStore
    Implementation of SchemaVersionStore which persists data in Zookeeper.

    • Method Detail

      • fetch

        public int fetch()
          throws StateStoreException
        Description copied from interface: SchemaVersionStore
        Retrieves the current schema version. This should be called by the StateStore or ConfigStore implementation before reading any other data. If the returned value is unsupported, the StateStore or ConfigStore is responsible for migrating the data to a version that's compatible. Note that this may auto-populate the underlying schema version if the value isn't currently present.
        Specified by:
        fetch in interface SchemaVersionStore
        Returns:
        the current schema version, which may be auto-populated with the current version
        Throws:
        StateStoreException - if retrieving the schema version fails

      • store

        public void store(int version)
           throws StateStoreException
        Description copied from interface: SchemaVersionStore
        Updates the schema version to the provided value. This should only be called as part of a migration to a new schema.
        Specified by:
        store in interface SchemaVersionStore
        Parameters:
        version - the new schema version to store
        Throws:
        StateStoreException - if storing the schema version fails
